content.review_text: I recently had the pleasure of working with Kathryn at AutoNation in Chattanooga, TN, and I cannot express enough how impressed I am with her professionalism, technical expertise, and outstanding customer service.
I want to take a moment to commend Hailey for her exceptional service at AutoNation yesterday. Her support made the experience completely hassle-free.
Michael went above and beyond; he was extremely easy to talk to. I let him know right at the start this was my budget on a used vehicle for my daughter, and it was literally right there.
Daniel from AutoNation Subaru in Fremont (San Francisco) helped me to buy my beautiful Subaru CrossTreck car yesterday. He was very nice, polite, and professional.
I went in on a Saturday morning without an appointment as my tires were low. I was immediately greeted by kind and caring staff who provided helpful service and were considerate of my worry.

In December 2024 I took my vehicle to Autonation Henderson and we are now here at April 15, 2025 and I still do not have my vehicle back. They have left me without a vehicle with no regard on how I will get to work or take care of my personal day to day life.
So I went to this place looking at a Honda Odyssey and spoke with Robert T. Mind you I had my own finance company and did not need theirs at all. I had USAA, Navy Federal Apple Credit Union.

We purchased a truck in July, 2024 with a 90 day/4000 mile warranty. Within the first two weeks, we had an engine lifter issue. We brought it in for repairs. Two weeks later, we had the same problem after Autonation fixed it.

No I did not. I came in two separate times. The truck was looked at and I was offered $70,000. There is damage to the rear driver side door. I told the person I was dealing with and the damage was evident.
Save yourself time and money and avoid Mercedes Southbay like the plague...having purchased over 20 cars in my lifetime, this was hands down the WORST car buying experience I have ever had!
